rounds.category: WHO'S SPEAKING IN THE HARRY POTTER BOOKS

clues.text: "I hope you're pleased with yourselves. We could all have been killed--or worse, expelled"
"You have permitted your friends to die for you rather than face me yourself. I shall wait for one hour in the Forbidden Forest"

"I want to commit the murder I was imprisoned for"

rounds.category: TRANSPORTED TO CHICAGO THROUGH THE MAGIC OF ENTERTAINMENT

clues.text: As this noted citizen of Chicago in "The Untouchables", De Niro says: "Somebody messes with me, I'm gonna mess with him"

rounds.text: Unable to lift the ball as a toddler, Jason Belmonte devised a 2-handed throw that made him an outcast, then a champ, in this sport
